these undertakings are directly or indirectly held by the parent entity. As a result:
(a) Non-financial subsidiaries are excluded from the scope of prudential consolidation
regardless of whether these subsidiaries are fully held by a holding company. On the other
hand, the holding company is included for prudential consolidation purposes;
